Table of Contents

Class KemInstance

Namespace
OpenForge.Cryptography.LibOqs.KEM
Assembly
OpenForge.Cryptography.LibOqs.KEM.dll

Represents a Key Encapsulation Mechanism (KEM) instance for performing cryptographic operations. This class provides methods for key generation, encapsulation, and decapsulation.

public sealed class KemInstance : IDisposable
Inheritance
object
KemInstance

IDisposable

Properties

AlgorithmName

Gets the name of the KEM algorithm used by this instance.

public string AlgorithmName { get; }

Property Value

string

The algorithm identifier string.

Methods

Decapsulate(ReadOnlySpan<byte>, ReadOnlySpan<byte>)

Decapsulates a shared secret from the ciphertext using the recipient's secret key. This recovers the same shared secret that was generated during encapsulation.

public byte[] Decapsulate(ReadOnlySpan<byte> ciphertext, ReadOnlySpan<byte> secretKey)

Parameters

ciphertext ReadOnlySpan<byte>

The ciphertext produced by encapsulation.

secretKey ReadOnlySpan<byte>

The recipient's secret key for decapsulation.

Returns

byte[]

The recovered shared secret that matches the one from encapsulation.

Exceptions

ObjectDisposedException

Thrown if the instance has been disposed.

ArgumentException

Thrown if parameters have invalid lengths.

InvalidOperationException

Thrown if decapsulation fails.

Dispose()

Disposes the KEM instance and releases all associated native resources. After disposal, this instance cannot be used for further operations.

public void Dispose()

Encapsulate(ReadOnlySpan<byte>)

Encapsulates a shared secret using the recipient's public key. This generates a ciphertext and a shared secret that can be used for symmetric encryption.

public EncapsulationResult Encapsulate(ReadOnlySpan<byte> publicKey)

Parameters

publicKey ReadOnlySpan<byte>

The recipient's public key for encapsulation.

Returns

EncapsulationResult

An EncapsulationResult containing the ciphertext and shared secret.

Exceptions

ObjectDisposedException

Thrown if the instance has been disposed.

ArgumentException

Thrown if the public key has an invalid length.

InvalidOperationException

Thrown if encapsulation fails.

EncapsulateDeterministic(ReadOnlySpan<byte>, ReadOnlySpan<byte>)

Performs deterministic encapsulation using the provided seed. This is primarily useful for testing and reproducible cryptographic operations.

public EncapsulationResult EncapsulateDeterministic(ReadOnlySpan<byte> publicKey, ReadOnlySpan<byte> seed)

Parameters

publicKey ReadOnlySpan<byte>

The public key to encapsulate against.

seed ReadOnlySpan<byte>

The 48-byte seed for deterministic encapsulation.

Returns

EncapsulationResult

The encapsulation result containing ciphertext and shared secret.

Exceptions

ArgumentException

Thrown if parameters have invalid lengths.

InvalidOperationException

Thrown if encapsulation fails.

~KemInstance()

Finalizer that ensures native resources are cleaned up if Dispose was not called.

protected ~KemInstance()

GenerateDeterministicKeyPair(ReadOnlySpan<byte>)

Generates a deterministic keypair using the provided seed. This is primarily useful for testing and reproducible cryptographic operations.

public KeyPair GenerateDeterministicKeyPair(ReadOnlySpan<byte> seed)

Parameters

seed ReadOnlySpan<byte>

The 48-byte seed for deterministic key generation.

Returns

KeyPair

A keypair generated deterministically from the seed.

Exceptions

ArgumentException

Thrown if seed is not exactly 48 bytes.

InvalidOperationException

Thrown if key generation fails.

GenerateKeyPair()

Generates a new cryptographic key pair using secure random number generation. The returned KeyPair should be disposed to securely clear the secret key.

public KeyPair GenerateKeyPair()

Returns

KeyPair

A KeyPair containing the public and secret keys.

Exceptions

ObjectDisposedException

Thrown if the instance has been disposed.

InvalidOperationException

Thrown if key pair generation fails.

GetAlgorithmInfo()

Gets detailed information about the KEM algorithm including key sizes and security parameters.

public OqsKem GetAlgorithmInfo()

Returns

OqsKem

An OqsKem structure containing algorithm details.

Exceptions

ObjectDisposedException

Thrown if the instance has been disposed.
